introabout.description: I'm Stefano, a FullStack Developer based in Rosario, Argentina.
experience.title: Experience

experience.experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experience.experiences.intro: These are some responsabilities & projects I worked on at
projects: Rebuilt all the UX/UI for a platform built with Vue JS. Made a new version for every existing page, mobile-first and using self-created SVG files, icons and specific colors for each client.
Front-end work using React JS, Styled Components, custom CSS, Context API, Redux, and some custom behaviors related to new libraries.
Maintenance of existing React Native app for iOS/Android. Bug fixes and development of new features.

tech.title: technologies I work with
about.title: About me
about.description:
Let me introduce myself. I am a Semi Senior Full Stack Developer with a strong passion for technology. I have amassed over two and a half years of experience in developing applications and websites using cutting-edge frameworks such as VueJS, ReactJS, and NuxtJS. My thirst for knowledge led me to take up a new challenge, and currently, I am working on developing Android native mobile apps in Kotlin.

Throughout my journey, I've come to understand the importance of teamwork in achieving quality results and constant growth.

 I am currently employed at Navent, where I serve as a Full Stack Developer responsible for developing Android Native Mobile apps in Kotlin.

 My passion for programming ignited in 2019 when I started developing my own Android native apps in JAVA. After spending some time in the mobile app development world, I shifted my focus to web development, where I spent two years honing my skills in VueJS and NuxtJS. Apart from programming, I also enjoy working on graphic design in Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator, Figma, etc.

 As a Full Stack Developer, I bring to the table my excellent communication and active listening skills, a natural flair for teamwork, an eye for detail and critical thinking. 

In my free time, I love to unwind by building my own projects, creating playlists, going to the gym, playing tennis & video games, and spending time with my friends.
